mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, AUTH, INSERTBY, INSERTDATE, UPDATEBY, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{auth}, #{insertBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, SYSDATE())

INSERT INTO FILE (FILENAME, SAVENAME, PUBLICKEY, URL, INSERTBY, INSERTDATE, UPDATEBY, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{saveName}, #{publickey}, #{url}, #{insertBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT N.UID, N.CONTENT, N.INSERTBY, N.INSERTDATE, N.UPDATEBY, N.UPDATEDATE FROM NOTICE N ORDER BY N.UID LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (CONTENT, INSERTBY, INSERTDATE, UPDATEBY, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{content}, #{insertBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, SYSDATE())
